headline: Is PPG Industries Attractively Priced After Industry Shifts and 13.5% Year-To-Date Drop?
summary: Curious whether PPG Industries is a bargain right now or overpriced? Let’s cut through the noise and get straight to what matters for value-focused investors. Shares have edged higher by 2.8% in the past week and are up 2.2% over the last 30 days, yet remain down by 13.5% year-to-date with a 1-year return of -18.6%. Recent headlines spotlight industry-wide shifts as demand patterns change, with analysts noting increased input costs and evolving regulations that could impact future returns...
